 28namespace vsip

 30
 31template <template <typename, typename> class View,
 32	  typename                            T,
 33	  typename                            Block>
 34struct ViewConversion;
 35
 36namespace impl
 37{
 38
 39template <template <typename, typename> class View,
 40	  typename                            T,
 41	  typename                            Block>
 42View<T, typename Distributed_local_block<Block>::type>
 43get_local_view(View<T, Block> v);
 44
 45/// Template class to help instantiate a view of a given dimension.
 46template <dimension_type Dim,
 47	  typename       T,
 48	  typename       Block>
 49struct View_of_dim;
 50
 51/// Trait that provides typedef 'type' iff VIEW is a valid view.
 52///
 53/// Views should provide specializations similar to:
 54///    template <> struct Is_view_type<Matrix>       { typedef void type; };
 55///    template <> struct Is_view_type<const_Matrix> { typedef void type; };
 56template <typename> struct Is_view_type { static bool const value = false;};
 57
 58
 59/// Trait that provides typedef 'type' iff VIEW is a valid const view.
 60template <typename> struct Is_const_view_type
 61{ static bool const value = false;};
 62
 63// Dim_of_view<V>
 64
 65template <template <typename,typename> class View> 
 66            struct Dim_of_view;
 67
 68template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::Vector>
 69  { static const dimension_type dim = 1; };
 70
 71template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::Matrix>
 72  { static const dimension_type dim = 2; };
 73
 74template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::Tensor> 
 75  { static const dimension_type dim = 3; };
 76
 77template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::const_Vector>
 78  { static const dimension_type dim = 1; };
 79
 80template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::const_Matrix>
 81  { static const dimension_type dim = 2; };
 82
 83template <> struct Dim_of_view<vsip::const_Tensor> 
 84  { static const dimension_type dim = 3; };
 85
 86// Const_of_view<V,B>
 87
 88template <template <typename,typename> class View, typename Block> 
 89                          struct Const_of_view;
 90
 91template <typename Block> struct Const_of_view<vsip::Vector,Block>
 92  { typedef vsip::const_Vector<typename Block::value_type,Block> view_type; };
 93
 94template <typename Block> struct Const_of_view<vsip::Matrix,Block>
 95  { typedef vsip::const_Matrix<typename Block::value_type,Block> view_type; };
 96
 97template <typename Block> struct Const_of_view<vsip::Tensor,Block> 
 98  { typedef vsip::const_Tensor<typename Block::value_type,Block> view_type; };
 99
100} // namespace impl
101
102template <template <typename,typename> class View,
103	  typename Block, typename T = typename Block::value_type,
104	  dimension_type Dim = impl::Dim_of_view<View>::dim >
105struct impl_const_View
106{ 
107  static const bool impl_is_view = true;
108  typedef View<T,Block> impl_vsip_view_type;
109  typedef impl_const_View impl_const_view_type;
110  typedef typename impl::View_block_storage<Block>::type impl_storage_type;
111
112  // Types for local views of distributed objects.
113  typedef typename impl::Distributed_local_block<Block>::type
114		 impl_localblock_type;
115  typedef View<T, impl_localblock_type> local_type;
116    
117  impl_const_View(Block* blk)
118    : impl_blk(blk) {}
119  impl_const_View(Block* blk, impl::noincrement_type)
120    : impl_blk(blk,impl::noincrement) {}
121
122  View<T,Block>& impl_view()
123    { return static_cast<View<T,Block>&>(*this); }
124  View<T,Block> const& impl_view() const
125    { return static_cast<View<T,Block> const&>(*this); }
126
127  // [view.vector.accessors]
128  // [view.matrix.accessors]
129  // [view.tensor.accessors]
130  Block& block() const VSIP_NOTHROW
131    { return *this->impl_blk; }
132  vsip::length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
133    { return this->impl_blk->size(); }
134  vsip::length_type size(vsip::dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
135    { return this->impl_blk->size(Dim, d); }
136
137  // [parview.vector.accessors]
138  local_type local() const VSIP_NOTHROW
139    { return vsip::impl::get_local_view(this->impl_view()); }
140
141protected:
142   impl_storage_type impl_blk;
143};
144
145// specialize for element type std::complex<T>
146
147template <template <typename,typename> class View,
148	  typename Block, typename T, dimension_type Dim>
149struct impl_const_View<View,Block,std::complex<T>,Dim>
150{ 
151  static const bool impl_is_view = true;
152  typedef View<std::complex<T>,Block> impl_vsip_view_type;
153  typedef impl_const_View impl_const_view_type;
154  typedef typename impl::View_block_storage<Block>::type impl_storage_type;
155
156  // Types for local views of distributed objects.
157  typedef typename impl::Distributed_local_block<Block>::type
158		 impl_localblock_type;
159  typedef View<std::complex<T>, impl_localblock_type> local_type;
160
161  typedef impl::Component_block<Block,impl::Real_extractor>
162    impl_rblock_type;
163  typedef impl::Component_block<Block,impl::Imag_extractor>
164    impl_iblock_type;
165  typedef T impl_scalar_type;
166
167  typedef View<T,impl_rblock_type> realview_type;
168  typedef View<T,impl_iblock_type> imagview_type;
169  typedef View<T,impl_rblock_type> const_realview_type;
170  typedef View<T,impl_iblock_type> const_imagview_type;
171
172  impl_const_View(Block* blk)
173    : impl_blk(blk) {}
174  impl_const_View(Block* blk, impl::noincrement_type)
175    : impl_blk(blk,impl::noincrement) {}
176
177  const_realview_type real() const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
178  {
179    impl_rblock_type block(*this->impl_blk);
180    return const_realview_type(block);
181  }
182  const_imagview_type imag() const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
183  {
184    impl_iblock_type block(*this->impl_blk);
185    return const_imagview_type(block);
186  }
187
188  View<std::complex<T>,Block>& impl_view()
189    { return static_cast<View<std::complex<T>,Block>&>(*this); }
190  View<std::complex<T>,Block> const& impl_view() const
191    { return static_cast<View<std::complex<T>,Block> const&>(*this); }
192
193  // [view.vector.accessors]
194  // [view.matrix.accessors]
195  // [view.tensor.accessors]
196  Block& block() const VSIP_NOTHROW
197    { return *this->impl_blk; }
198  vsip::length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
199    { return this->impl_blk->size(); }
200  vsip::length_type size(vsip::dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
201    { return this->impl_blk->size(Dim, d); }
202
203  // [parview.vector.accessors]
204  local_type local() const VSIP_NOTHROW
205    { return vsip::impl::get_local_view(this->impl_view()); }
206
207protected:
208   impl_storage_type impl_blk;
209};
210
211namespace impl
212{
213  enum disambiguator_type { disambiguate }; 
214}
215
216template <template <typename,typename> class View,
217	  typename Block, typename T = typename Block::value_type,
218	  dimension_type Dim = impl::Dim_of_view<View>::dim>
219struct impl_View : impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type
220{ 
221  static const bool impl_is_nonconst_view = true;
222  typedef View<T,Block> impl_vsip_view_type;
223  typedef typename impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type impl_base_type;
224  typedef typename Block::map_type impl_map_type;
225  typedef typename
226    impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type::impl_const_view_type
227      impl_const_view_type;
228
229  // Types for local views of distributed objects.
230  typedef typename impl_base_type::impl_localblock_type impl_localblock_type;
231  typedef View<T, impl_localblock_type> local_type;
232
233  impl_View(length_type len, T const& value,
234       impl_map_type const& map, impl::disambiguator_type)
235    : impl_base_type(len, value, map) {}
236  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, T const& value,
237       impl_map_type const& map, impl::disambiguator_type)
238    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, value, map) {}
239  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, length_type len3,
240       T const& value, impl_map_type const& map, impl::disambiguator_type)
241    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, len3, value, map) {}
242  impl_View(length_type len, impl_map_type const& map)
243    : impl_base_type(len, map) {}
244  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, impl_map_type const& map)
245    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, map) {}
246  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, length_type len3,
247       impl_map_type const& map)
248    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, len3, map) {}
249  explicit impl_View(Block& blk) VSIP_NOTHROW
250    : impl_base_type(blk) {}
251  impl_View(impl_View const& v) VSIP_NOTHROW
252    : impl_base_type(v.block()) {}
253
254  View<T,Block>& impl_view() { return static_cast<View<T,Block>&>(*this); }
255  View<T,Block> const& impl_view() const
256    { return static_cast<View<T,Block> const&>(*this); }
257
258  // [parview.vector.accessors]
259  local_type local() const VSIP_NOTHROW
260    { return vsip::impl::get_local_view(this->impl_view()); }
261};
262
263// specialize for element type std::complex<T>
264
265template <template <typename,typename> class View,
266	  typename Block, typename T, dimension_type Dim>
267struct impl_View<View,Block,std::complex<T>,Dim>
268  : impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type
269{ 
270  static const bool impl_is_nonconst_view = true;
271  typedef View<std::complex<T>,Block> impl_vsip_view_type;
272  typedef typename
273    impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type::impl_const_view_type
274      impl_const_view_type;
275  typedef typename impl::Const_of_view<View,Block>::view_type impl_base_type;
276  typedef typename Block::map_type impl_map_type;
277
278  // Types for local views of distributed objects.
279  typedef typename impl_base_type::impl_localblock_type impl_localblock_type;
280  typedef View<std::complex<T>, impl_localblock_type> local_type;
281
282  typedef impl::Component_block<Block,impl::Real_extractor> impl_rblock_type;
283  typedef impl::Component_block<Block,impl::Imag_extractor> impl_iblock_type;
284  typedef T impl_scalar_type;
285
286  // complex
287  typedef typename impl::Const_of_view<View,impl_rblock_type>::view_type
288    const_realview_type;
289  typedef typename impl::Const_of_view<View,impl_iblock_type>::view_type 
290    const_imagview_type;
291  typedef View<T,impl_rblock_type> realview_type;
292  typedef View<T,impl_iblock_type> imagview_type;
293
294  impl_View(length_type len, std::complex<T> const& value,
295       impl_map_type const& map, impl::disambiguator_type)
296    : impl_base_type(len, value, map) {}
297  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, std::complex<T> const& value,
298       impl_map_type const& map, impl::disambiguator_type)
299    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, value, map) {}
300  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, length_type len3,
301      std::complex<T> const& value, impl_map_type const& map,
302      impl::disambiguator_type)
303    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, len3, value, map) {}
304  impl_View(length_type len, impl_map_type const& map)
305    : impl_base_type(len, map) {}
306  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, impl_map_type const& map)
307    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, map) {}
308  impl_View(length_type len1, length_type len2, length_type len3,
309       impl_map_type const& map)
310    : impl_base_type(len1, len2, len3, map) {}
311  explicit impl_View(Block& blk) VSIP_NOTHROW
312    : impl_base_type(blk) {}
313  impl_View(impl_View const& v) VSIP_NOTHROW
314    : impl_base_type(v.block()) {}
315  const_realview_type real() const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
316    { return this->impl_const_view_type::real(); }
317  realview_type real() VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
318  {
319    impl_rblock_type block(this->block());
320    return realview_type(block);
321  }
322  const_imagview_type imag() const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
323    { return this->impl_const_view_type::imag(); }
324  imagview_type imag() VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
325  {
326    impl_iblock_type block(this->block());
327    return imagview_type(block);
328  }
329
330  View<std::complex<T>,Block>& impl_view()
331    { return static_cast<View<std::complex<T>,Block>&>(*this); }
332  View<std::complex<T>,Block> const& impl_view() const
333    { return static_cast<View<std::complex<T>,Block> const&>(*this); }
334
335  // [parview.vector.accessors]
336  local_type local() const VSIP_NOTHROW
337    { return vsip::impl::get_local_view(this->impl_view()); }
338};
339
340} // namespace vsip
